messages.subject: Re: blog carnival
messages.msgSnippet: ... By July 1, please - although if you re on RUN you could always add a link later in a reply if you wanted, or I can include your link in the August
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Sylvia Toyama <sylgt04@...> wrote:
> You want our blog post links by July 1, or is anytime during July okay? We haven't done any traveling in June, but we will in about 3 weeks....

By July 1, please - although if you're on RUN you could always add a link later in a "reply" if you wanted, or I can include your link in the August carnival. The August topic is in honor of Learn Nothing Day, so the topic is pretty wide - anything related to learning or not learning ;)

---Meredith
